data.name: The Blunderbuss
data.detailed_description:
The blunderbuss is an open world video game that consists of guiding the character through 3 people, shooting, climbing walls and, above all, stealing vehicles while moving through a country inspired by Latin America.
In this video game you will be able to buy weapons, bullets, clothes and you will have an inventory to be able to carry out the missions of the game and finish the story.

In an environment of aggression, drugs, alcohol and sex, this great story unfolds.
Summary of what the story was about:

The blunderbuss (El trabucazo) is a fascinating and powerful bomb created by the most powerful and secretive cartel in the Dominican Republic. This organization has managed to circumvent the Caribbean maritime authorities for decades. Due to the ambition of their leader, they involve Eduardo, a common man, poor, impulsive, raised from the strata of the hot neighborhood. His ephemeral participation lasted longer than expected. Now he must find a way to prevent the detonation of that unique bomb to protect his loved ones. He relies on his friends, but must dirty his hands with criminal acts to achieve his goal despite the tarnishing of his name and the casualties that fall in his way. All this must be achieved before the... Blunderbuss!

data.short_description: The blunderbuss is a powerful bomb created by the most secretive cartel in the DR. They involve Eduardo, an ordinary man who must prevent the detonation of that unique bomb to protect his loved ones before... Blunderbuss!
data.supported_languages:
Spanish - Latin America*, Spanish - Spain*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: ntel Core i5-6600K / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2700K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 4GB / AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
